description.title: WELCOME TO BIAST
description.intro: With Biast, your training is guaranteed and your future is no longer a major concern. All our courses are recognized by foreign countries such as: France, Germany, Austria etc...

hystory.title: OUR HISTORY
hystory.content: The brilliant thought of Professor Talla Pierre Kisito to give birth to the sparks of the Biast Institute in 2020. It is thanks to these many trips around the world in general, and the different cooperation with the great business leaders in particular, who gave life to this institute..

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.content: Ensuring the future of children is one of the most frequent problems in a family. Biast's mission is to train children and guarantee them a better future in large schools in large countries.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.content: Biast aims to establish a solid connection between Cameroon and foreign countries so that all students who are trained can benefit from the help of outside hands more to experiment in order to advance their knowledge and advance technique and education in our country.

hiscont.p1: Created by university scientists and professors by the decree n°19/00/649/MINESUP/SG/DDES/ESUP of July 10th, 2019, the Bilingual Institute of Applied Science and Technology (BIAST) / Institut Universitaire Bilingue des Sciences Appliquées et Technologie (BIAST) is a bilingual(English and French) institute of excellence and innovation with a team of qualified and experienced teachers, laboratories, and workshops equipped with state-of-the-art equipment. BIAST is in partnership with some Cameroonian universities, like the University of Dschang which is one of the best state universities in Central Africa. BIAST is also in partnership with other foreign universities, such as, UNIVERSITE DE LORRAINE in France. Our mission is to contribute and enable students to acquire an excellent professional training making them better senior technicians/Engineers capable of building solid nation. BIAST offers facilities for studies, better academic, professional and practical training, including the spirit of entrepreneurship and innovation. BIAST also facilitates enrolment in major medical and engineering schools in abroad, such as in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

miscont.p1: Equipping the youth with the skills and competencies they need to face the changing realities of the modern world, through our diverse, practical and innovative training program.

viscont.p1: BIAST is a Cameroon's leading Smart University Institution, globally renowned for practical oriented and innovative education, with graduates that shape a better world for humanity. In times of constant change in the world, we are always faced with new and gigantic challenges. It is impossible to predict what the future will bring, neither on a social nor on an economic, technological, or scientific level. We can however Equip ourselves with skills and competencies that are required to deal with new situations constructively, to be able to act and react competently face to new phenomena, and thus ultimately to create something new and relevant.
viscont.p2: BIAST offers more than just academic awards and degrees. It has a holistic education goal, that goes beyond short-term employability optimization. The educational ideal of the BIAST is that of the creative, competent, innovative, critical thinking, problem-solving, entrepreneurial personality that is adaptive to changes in the world. Mastering the tasks and challenges of the future is the main goal of our graduates. We train graduates who are effectively professionally operational and prepared for self-employment.
